content: >**get 20 % off when you buy 3 patterns no coupon needed** this easy square potholder uses the even moss stitch to create a textured double-thick potholder a video tutorial for this pattern is available on my youtube channel square potholder crochet pattern 1 the pattern pdf contains timestamps for each row and step in the pattern this was made to match the even moss stitch dishcloth and dishtowel patterns dishcloth https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/even-moss-stitch-dishcloth dishtowel https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/even-moss-dishtowel > subscribe to my newsletter 2 to be notified when new patterns come out and get other free patterns from the pattern library materials needed 125 yards of a cotton #4 medium-weight yarn yarn used lily s sugar and cream 4 5 mm 7 crochet hook optional 5 5mm crochet hook for foundation chain yarn needle to weave in ends stitch markers 1 https //youtu be/o_mhiehlrii 2 https //subscribepage io/mfhzxe
